name: Astropolitica
description:
ASTROPOLITICA - An AI-driven galactic civilization simulator with a focus on more sophisticated political and decisionmaking AI, and emergent simulation. Additionally, it features many aspects of randomized generation for both practical(initial government setup) and aesthetic(colors, names, and flags) traits, tools which are also discretely available for player use.

Astropolitica is currently considered to be in Alpha, and is (typically) updated fairly often. Please check back for updates!

Official Discord! https://discord.gg/FwgsGSM This is the best place to be informed of upcoming features, be notified of new builds, and hang out with other players. You can even suggest features and/or civilization names!

All music is royalty free music created by Ross Bugden(search him on YT)!

Much of the text is powered by Scribble, created by JujuAdams, a Gamemaker legend with tons of immensely useful GML libraries. Check him out if you use GML!
